responseText: NSLOCTEXT("[4BE4F0A16D08556ACD6685BF392E6719]", "09DA825746791193498CA297168A2215", "The pillar is made of a dark, unknown stone. Three large, distinct symbols are carved into it: a snarling Boar, a sturdy Anvil, and a coiled Serpent. Below each symbol is a shallow, circular socket, currently empty. A faint energy seems to pulse from the stone.")
name: ANV_FTUE_HR_0009_ThoseThatRemained_Pillar_Anvil_DLG_6_Response
